api_list.name: Get trivia questions by category
api_list.description: Find trivia questions of a certain category, like "language arts", or "math". Optionally specify amount of questions with `limit` query.

api_list.name: Search trivia questions
api_list.description: Search for trivia questions containing a certain string. Optionally limit results with `limit` query.

api_list.name: Get specified amount of random trivia questions
api_list.description: Fetch an amount of random trivia questions. Returns different set each time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trivious.p.rapidapi.com/random/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivious.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trivious.p.rapidapi.com/random/{amount}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivious.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
